label: Advertising Website
description: An advertising website is the best way to get your business or product seen. Just enough to make an impact on the web but not enough to make direct sales.

label: Personal/Business Blog
description: A blog is a great way to create valuable content that you can share across the internet. Many people use blogs in place of social media.

label: E-commerce Application/Website
description: E-commerce is the new normal. If you want to sell to the largest possible market, you need an e-commerce app/website.

label: Business Application/Website
description: A business application/website is built to perform a certain amount of your business for you. A business application can take many forms and perform many functions.
